languages.text: "Этот Винтерскейл было ничего такой, ведал радость битвы, не трусил... но все же мелковат".
"That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... though he was still a bit of a runt."
languages.original_text: "Этот Винтерскейл было ничего такой, ведал радость битвы, не трусил... но все же мелковат".

traits.locale_text: "That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... thought he was still a bit of a runt."
"That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... thought he was still a bit of a runt."
"That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... thought he was still a bit of a runt."
"That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... thought he was still a bit of a runt."

languages.text: “那个温特斯凯尔还不赖嘛。他懂得战斗的乐趣，也不是懦夫……我之前还以为他就是个小侏儒。”
languages.original_text: "That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... though he was still a bit of a runt."

traits.locale_text: “那个温特斯凯尔还不赖嘛。他懂得战斗的乐趣，也不是懦夫……我之前还以为他就是个小侏儒。”

languages.text: « Ce Winterscale n'était pas si affreux que ça. Il prenait plaisir à se battre et n'avait rien d'un lâche... même s'il n'était pas bien épais. »
languages.original_text: "That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... though he was still a bit of a runt."

traits.locale_text: « Ce Winterscale n'était pas si affreux que ça. Il prenait plaisir à se battre et n'avait rien d'un lâche... même s'il n'était pas bien épais. »

languages.text: «El tal Winterscale no era del todo malo. Conocía la alegría de luchar y no era ningún cobarde... aunque sí un poco flojo».
languages.original_text: "That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... though he was still a bit of a runt."

traits.locale_text: «El tal Winterscale no era del todo malo. Conocía la alegría de luchar y no era ningún cobarde... aunque sí un poco flojo».

languages.text: 「あのウィンタースケールはそんなに悪い奴じゃなかったな。戦いの喜びを知り、腰抜けでもなかった…ちょっとできは悪かったが」
languages.original_text: "That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... though he was still a bit of a runt."

traits.locale_text: 「あのウィンタースケールはそんなに悪い奴じゃなかったな。戦いの喜びを知り、腰抜けでもなかった…ちょっとできは悪かったが」

languages.text: "Dieser Winterzunder war gar nicht mal so übel. Er kannte die Freude des Kampfs, und er war kein Feigling ... wenn auch ein wenig ein Kümmerling."
languages.original_text: "That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... though he was still a bit of a runt."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Winterzunder war gar nicht mal so übel. Er kannte die Freude des Kampfs, und er war kein Feigling ... wenn auch ein wenig ein Kümmerling."

languages.original_text: "That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... thought he was still a bit of a runt."

languages.text: "O Winterscale fena değildi. Savaşın coşkusuna aşinaydı, korku bilmezdi. Gerçi azıcık yerden bitmeydi."
languages.original_text: "That Winterscale wasn't half bad. He knew the joy of battle, and he was no coward... though he was still a bit of a runt."

traits.locale_text: "Winterscale fena değildi. Savaşın neşesini bilirdi ve korkak değildi. Gerçi cücenin tekiydi ama..."
